AddCustomAttributes.name: AddCustomAttributes
AddCustomAttributes.description: Adds additional user attributes to the user pool schema.

AdminAddUserToGroup.name: AdminAddUserToGroup
AdminAddUserToGroup.description: Adds the specified user to the specified group.

AdminConfirmSignUp.name: AdminConfirmSignUp
AdminConfirmSignUp.description:
Confirms user registration as an admin without using a confirmation code. Works on
                                                any user.

AdminCreateUser.name: AdminCreateUser
AdminCreateUser.description:
Creates a new user in the specified user pool and sends a welcome message via email
                                                or phone (SMS).

AdminDeleteUser.name: AdminDeleteUser
AdminDeleteUser.description: Deletes a user as an administrator. Works on any user.

AdminDeleteUserAttributes.name: AdminDeleteUserAttributes
AdminDeleteUserAttributes.description: Deletes the user attributes in a user pool as an administrator. Works on any user.

AdminDisableProviderForUser.name: AdminDisableProviderForUser
AdminDisableProviderForUser.description:
Disables the user from signing in with the specified external (SAML or social) identity
                                                provider.

AdminDisableUser.name: AdminDisableUser
AdminDisableUser.description: Disables the specified user as an administrator. Works on any user.

AdminEnableUser.name: AdminEnableUser
AdminEnableUser.description: Enables the specified user as an administrator. Works on any user.

AdminForgetDevice.name: AdminForgetDevice
AdminForgetDevice.description: Forgets the device, as an administrator.

AdminGetDevice.name: AdminGetDevice
AdminGetDevice.description: Gets the device, as an administrator.

AdminGetUser.name: AdminGetUser
AdminGetUser.description:
Gets the specified user by user name in a user pool as an administrator. Works on
                                                any user.

AdminInitiateAuth.name: AdminInitiateAuth
AdminInitiateAuth.description: Authenticates a user in a user pool as an administrator. Works on any user.

AdminLinkProviderForUser.name: AdminLinkProviderForUser
AdminLinkProviderForUser.description:
Links an existing user account in a user pool (DestinationUser) to an identity from
                                                an external identity provider (SourceUser) based on a specified attribute name and
                                                value from the external identity provider.

AdminListGroupsForUser.name: AdminListGroupsForUser
AdminListGroupsForUser.description: Lists the groups that the user belongs to.

AdminListUserAuthEvents.name: AdminListUserAuthEvents
AdminListUserAuthEvents.description: Lists the authentication events for the user.

AdminRemoveUserFromGroup.name: AdminRemoveUserFromGroup
AdminRemoveUserFromGroup.description: Removes the specified user from the specified group.

AdminResetUserPassword.name: AdminResetUserPassword
AdminResetUserPassword.description:
Resets the specified user's password in a user pool as an administrator. Works on
                                                any user.

AdminRespondToAuthChallenge.name: AdminRespondToAuthChallenge
AdminRespondToAuthChallenge.description: Responds to an authentication challenge, as an administrator.

AdminSetUserMFAPreference.name: AdminSetUserMFAPreference
AdminSetUserMFAPreference.description: Sets MFA preference for the user in the userpool

AdminSetUserPassword.name: AdminSetUserPassword
AdminSetUserPassword.description:
Sets the specified user's password in a user pool as an administrator. Works on any
                                                user.

AdminSetUserSettings.name: AdminSetUserSettings
AdminSetUserSettings.description: Sets all the user settings for a specified user name. Works on any user.

AdminUpdateAuthEventFeedback.name: AdminUpdateAuthEventFeedback
AdminUpdateAuthEventFeedback.description: Updates the feedback for the user authentication event

AdminUpdateDeviceStatus.name: AdminUpdateDeviceStatus
AdminUpdateDeviceStatus.description: Updates the device status as an administrator.

AdminUpdateUserAttributes.name: AdminUpdateUserAttributes
AdminUpdateUserAttributes.description: Updates the specified user's attributes, including developer attributes, as an administrator.

AdminUserGlobalSignOut.name: AdminUserGlobalSignOut
AdminUserGlobalSignOut.description: Signs out users from all devices, as an administrator.

AssociateSoftwareToken.name: AssociateSoftwareToken
AssociateSoftwareToken.description: Returns a unique generated shared secret key code for the user account.

ChangePassword.name: ChangePassword
ChangePassword.description: Changes the password for a specified user in a user pool.

ConfirmDevice.name: ConfirmDevice
ConfirmDevice.description: Confirms tracking of the device. This API call is the call that begins device tracking.

ConfirmForgotPassword.name: ConfirmForgotPassword
ConfirmForgotPassword.description: Allows a user to enter a confirmation code to reset a forgotten password.

ConfirmSignUp.name: ConfirmSignUp
ConfirmSignUp.description: Confirms registration of a user and handles the existing alias from a previous user.

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Creates a new group in the specified user pool.

CreateIdentityProvider.name: CreateIdentityProvider
CreateIdentityProvider.description: Creates an identity provider for a user pool.

CreateResourceServer.name: CreateResourceServer
CreateResourceServer.description: Creates a new OAuth2.0 resource server and defines custom scopes in it.

CreateUserPool.name: CreateUserPool
CreateUserPool.description: Creates a new Amazon Cognito user pool and sets the password policy for the pool.

CreateUserPoolDomain.name: CreateUserPoolDomain
CreateUserPoolDomain.description: Creates a new domain for a user pool.

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Deletes a group. Currently only groups with no members can be deleted.

DeleteIdentityProvider.name: DeleteIdentityProvider
DeleteIdentityProvider.description: Deletes an identity provider for a user pool.

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Allows a user to delete one's self.

DeleteUserAttributes.name: DeleteUserAttributes
DeleteUserAttributes.description: Deletes the attributes for a user.

DeleteUserPool.name: DeleteUserPool
DeleteUserPool.description: Deletes the specified Amazon Cognito user pool.

DeleteUserPoolClient.name: DeleteUserPoolClient
DeleteUserPoolClient.description: Allows the developer to delete the user pool client.

DeleteUserPoolDomain.name: DeleteUserPoolDomain
DeleteUserPoolDomain.description: Deletes a domain for a user pool.

DescribeIdentityProvider.name: DescribeIdentityProvider
DescribeIdentityProvider.description: Gets information about a specific identity provider.

DescribeRiskConfiguration.name: DescribeRiskConfiguration
DescribeRiskConfiguration.description: Describes the risk configuration setting for the userpool / userpool client

DescribeUserPool.name: DescribeUserPool
DescribeUserPool.description: Returns the configuration information and metadata of the specified user pool.

DescribeUserPoolClient.name: DescribeUserPoolClient
DescribeUserPoolClient.description:
Client method for returning the configuration information and metadata of the specified
                                                user pool client.

ForgotPassword.name: ForgotPassword
ForgotPassword.description:
Calling this API causes a message to be sent to the end user with a confirmation code
                                                that is required to change the user's password.

GetCSVHeader.name: GetCSVHeader
GetCSVHeader.description:
Gets the header information for the .csv file to be used as input for the user import
                                                job.

GetUICustomization.name: GetUICustomization
GetUICustomization.description:
Gets the UI Customization information for a particular app client's app UI, if there
                                                is something set.

GetUser.name: GetUser
GetUser.description: Gets the user attributes and metadata for a user.

GetUserAttributeVerificationCode.name: GetUserAttributeVerificationCode
GetUserAttributeVerificationCode.description: Gets the user attribute verification code for the specified attribute name.

GetUserPoolMfaConfig.name: GetUserPoolMfaConfig
GetUserPoolMfaConfig.description: Gets the MFA configuration for the userpool

GlobalSignOut.name: GlobalSignOut
GlobalSignOut.description: Signs out users from all devices.

ListGroups.name: ListGroups
ListGroups.description: Lists the groups associated with a user pool.

ListIdentityProviders.name: ListIdentityProviders
ListIdentityProviders.description: Lists information about all identity providers for a user pool.

ListResourceServers.name: ListResourceServers
ListResourceServers.description: Lists the resource servers for a user pool.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Lists the tags that are assigned to an Amazon Cognito user pool.

ListUserPoolClients.name: ListUserPoolClients
ListUserPoolClients.description: Lists the clients that have been created for the specified user pool.

ListUserPools.name: ListUserPools
ListUserPools.description: Lists the user pools associated with an AWS account.

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Lists the users in the Amazon Cognito user pool.

ListUsersInGroup.name: ListUsersInGroup
ListUsersInGroup.description: Lists the users in the specified group.

ResendConfirmationCode.name: ResendConfirmationCode
ResendConfirmationCode.description:
Resends the confirmation (for confirmation of registration) to a specific user in
                                                the user pool.

SetRiskConfiguration.name: SetRiskConfiguration
SetRiskConfiguration.description: sets the risk configuration setting for the userpool / userpool client

SetUICustomization.name: SetUICustomization
SetUICustomization.description: Sets the UI customization information for a user pool's built-in app UI.

SetUserMFAPreference.name: SetUserMFAPreference
SetUserMFAPreference.description: Sets MFA preference for the user in the userpool

SetUserPoolMfaConfig.name: SetUserPoolMfaConfig
SetUserPoolMfaConfig.description: Sets the MFA configuration for the userpool

SetUserSettings.name: SetUserSettings
SetUserSettings.description: Sets the user settings like multi-factor authentication (MFA).

SignUp.name: SignUp
SignUp.description:
Registers the user in the specified user pool and creates a user name, password, and
                                                user attributes.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Assigns a set of tags to an Amazon Cognito user pool.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes the specified tags from an Amazon Cognito user pool.

UpdateAuthEventFeedback.name: UpdateAuthEventFeedback
UpdateAuthEventFeedback.description: Updates the feedback for the user authentication event

UpdateGroup.name: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.description: Updates the specified group with the specified attributes.

UpdateIdentityProvider.name: UpdateIdentityProvider
UpdateIdentityProvider.description: Updates identity provider information for a user pool.

UpdateResourceServer.name: UpdateResourceServer
UpdateResourceServer.description: Updates the name and scopes of resource server.

UpdateUserAttributes.name: UpdateUserAttributes
UpdateUserAttributes.description: Allows a user to update a specific attribute (one at a time).

UpdateUserPool.name: UpdateUserPool
UpdateUserPool.description: Updates the specified user pool with the specified attributes.

UpdateUserPoolClient.name: UpdateUserPoolClient
UpdateUserPoolClient.description: Allows the developer to update the specified user pool client and password policy.

UpdateUserPoolDomain.name: UpdateUserPoolDomain
UpdateUserPoolDomain.description:
Updates the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate for the custom domain for your
                                                user pool.

VerifySoftwareToken.name: VerifySoftwareToken
VerifySoftwareToken.description:
Registers a user's entered TOTP code and mark the user's software token MFA status
                                                as verified if successful.

VerifyUserAttribute.name: VerifyUserAttribute
VerifyUserAttribute.description: Verifies a user attribute using a one time verification code.
